name: Rosetta & Philae
description:
Pilot the Rosetta space probe and try to land Rosetta on Comet 67P. Use W + S keys to control thrust, and the arrow keys to control orientation. The space bar releases the Philae lander, which uses the arrow keys to thrust in all directions.

This game was made as over two days by a two man team as our submission to the Guildford Game Jam. It was inspired by this beautiful video created by the European Space Agency:

Thanks for playing!
